content.detailedDescription:
I speak with a law enforcement officer that has been seeing from 9 - 50 ufo's nightly unless overcast since august of 2011. as of today he has seen approximatley 200 or more. in his words they seem to suround a bigger brighter object in the sky. while we are speaking on the phone nightly then suddenly appear above him for 30-60 minutes nightly. i am reporting this because his fellow officers kibits him about it and i feel mufon should follow up with this and video tape it for the public being it is nightly. the area is above boyton beach which is fairly dark at night to see the sky much better if videoed.
i myself have seen 9 different objests at various dates in the last 3 months that i can't explain the origin. one in particular i have seen 3 times which is like a opaqe diode that lights up and then goes out. after it travels a certain distance it does it again. i don't know of any satellites that light up and yet nightly i can spot satellites so i know the difference. i hope some of you substantiate these nightly sitings in florida.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Nightly sitings of many ufo's

content.detailedDescription: The ufo was black mat, it was changing its shape .I can not discribe it. you should see it in person. i have it in my hd camcorder & unable to upload it.
content.summary: I got it on tape its hd & unable to upload it.

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday night- october 4th, 2011- at about 7:30, i was coming home in my daughter's car.  as i drove into my neighborhood, i glanced down the street where our clubhouse is.  above it there was a big mass of lights just sitting there.  i had just watched a show about aliens the night before so i immediately thought, 'no, it can't be.'  i thought it was too much of a coincidence and too crazy. 
i backed up and turned down that street and drove toward it.  it just sat there!  this gigantic mass of lights!  as i got closer, i could see that it was a triangle shaped craft of some kind.  it was only about 500 feet above the building, just hovering.  it was black, but it looked like it was made out of mercury.  i could see the whole underside of the craft as i drove slowly toward it.  it had yellow-orange lights at each corner that pulsated and blue and white lights just inside the perimiter.  they were very bright and they cast a bright light on everything below, but they didn't glare like our normal lights do.  the light seemed to be a part of the surface.  just as i got in front of the clubhouse, it rotated and took off.  it flew across the street and up over the trees toward my house in a straight line.  i drove on down the street toward home and as i turned the first corner, there was a group of people running the same direction.  i caught up with them just as i got to the last turn onto my street and one of the guys yelled, "did you see it?"  
i said, "yes!"
he said, "it was a freakin' space ship!"
i knew exactly what it was but it didn't really hit me until i heard him say the words.  anyway, i wasn't scared at all, but i had misplaced my cell phone somewhere in my daughter's car, or so i thought.  i remember unplugging it that morning and putting it in my purse but couldn't find it later.  i thought it fell out in her car.  i didn't have any way of taking a picture without it.  after i turned the corner, i could see it up ahead.  it had stopped again just past my house.  i drove down the street and pulled in the driveway honking my horn as loud as i could.  i wanted my daughter to come outside and see it so my family wouldn't think i was crazy or something.  she said she didn't even hear the horn and i was really laying on it.  anyway, i jumped out of the car, forgot to turn the engine off and left the door hanging open because i wanted to go get her and my camera.  as soon as i got to the gate, it spun around and took off again.  this time it went almost straight up and it was gone in a fraction of a second.  i have never seen anything move that fast in my life!  those other people had been running down the street right behind me, but after it disappeared, they were gone too.  i don't know who they were or where they went but it was really weird.  they were right behind me one second and gone the next!  i looked up and then back toward them and they were just gone.  my heart was beating so fast by the time i got inside i could actually hear it.  i think my daughter did too.  she knew i wasn't kidding when i told her about it.  i have never seen anything so strange in all my life.  it was as big as three huge houses and it was just sitting there until i got close.  then, it went to my house and waited for me!  that's how it seemed anyway.  
later i looked all through my daughter's car for my phone and still couldn't find it.  i went back in and then to my bedroom and there was my phone, plugged into the charger laying on my bed.  i know i remember taking it off the charger that morning and putting it in my purse!  i thought maybe it fell out and malory put it back on the charger but she swears she didn't.  
i don't know how any of it happened, but it did.  looking back, it really scares me.  did that thing know where i lived?  and what was up with those people and my phone?  i feel like i'm loosing my mind but i am as sure about all of it as i could possibly be.  i wish i could find those people but i'm not about to go door to door asking if the people who saw the ufo live there.  i filled out a report on the national ufo report site but i didn't bother to call the police.  what could they do?  probably just laugh.  
 
the next day my other daughter told some friends at work about it and two of them said they had seen something that sounded like the same thing within the past week.  i wonder how many other people have seen them around here?  

anyway, i spent several hours on the computer looking at new aviation technology and i can't find anything that's anything close to being like what i saw.  then a friend said something that made perfect sense.  if it was an experimental government or military aircraft, why would they be flying it over a neighborhood full of people?  why would they hover for so long allowing us to see it?  i know, without a doubt, it was not from this earth.  i knew it the moment i got close enough to see it.  i never denied the possibility of aliens visiting earth, but that just took all doubt away.  it was unbelievably amazing!  now i'm reading that other's in this area saw something similar around the same time.  wow!
content.summary: Obvious spacecraft visits independence, mo neighborhood on october 4, 2011

content.detailedDescription: My wife, daughter, her friend and i were comming home from the store.  when we started to turn into the neighborhood my wire noticed a bright object in the sky in the middle of the big dipper and asked me what it was.  i seen the object and then a bright red one at the right edge of the big dipper.  both were stationairy and were not flashing, just solid light.  looked to be just north of town and they were not flashing like the normal aricraft that we see in the sky.  there is a national guard helicopter unit outside of town and it looked nothing like what we see every day and night.  the red one disappeared very quick and the white/yellow one stayed in one spot. after about 2-3 minutes it started getting smaller but never moved toward the horizion, it was as if it was moving out of the atmosphere and slowly got smaller and dimmer until it disapered.  this was nothing like we see around here and it made my wife a little nervous
content.summary: Two hovered in sky in the ursa major constellation, one white one red.

content.detailedDescription: This is something that takes place all the time, we are witnessing this with a telescope, unlike anything i have ever witnessed
content.summary: Able to view on regular basis, shape looks like christmas ornament, you may contact me and we can view it together

content.detailedDescription:
10.7.2011 
this past friday night around 9:30 pm very clear night no cloud cover, i was driving down this dark road to drop my husband off to his shared ride to work. on the way we seen this very bright orange light that was very out of place, hovering just above the treeline, it's never been there before as we take this road nightly. it looked like a bright orange ball of light almost star like, then a blinking (mostly white and some red lights) craft came out of it. i was watching the road as well and lost sight for a second but my husband said it should show up when we pass the trees and sure enough there it was traveling very fast with flashing, blinking, very fast lights almost to the point of looking like a sparkler that kids have on the 4th of july {best i can describe it} the orange ball of light that it came from seem to be gone. the blinking light would blink and the whole craft would shift left and then right,forward and then back,sometimes the lights would completely go out, there was absolutely no sound. 
friday night is the first time we seen the orange light. it's almost like the orange light was a portal or vortex that the blinking object came out of or possibly the orange light turned into the blinking craft?

we see this blinking object allot, almost every night. later on i plan to buy a very good camera with a hella zoom lens so i can capture all the oddness that we see out here in manchester, tn. usa!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange ball with blinking craft that seem to come out of it

content.detailedDescription:
10th - 10th - 11

hi,

i was standing by my bay window here at home looking out to the evening light -  we live on the east coast of ireland right on the bay here.  normally we have areplances and sea resuce operations going on all the time.  but i think last night's event was something else.  the hum of the noise was loud, and the lights were a v shape i think you know what i mean.  i am a person who doesn't take this lightly are if something strange goes on around here.  i was talking to my younger sister on the phone and saying it to her.  talk about being surprised!..  as to say who'd believe in these things.   it happened around nine o'clock our time.   there have been other events of lights appearing in the sky here over the bay, and have being record on you tube. i am sorry i didn't get it on video or phone as i was talking at the time and quiet shocked.  hope you'll understand this.

i am yours sincerely,

mr mark f gillan
content.summary: Hovering over my home here in sandycove co dublin ireland

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone and e-mail:  

"i let the dog out of the back door of my house because he was barking at something - at first i thought he just needed to go out, but he stopped and looked up after he reached the edge of the patio.  i stepped outside and looked where the dog was looking and saw three spheres floating at about 30 feet off the ground not 50 feet away from me.  they were glowing a bright red-orange and looked like they were on fire. my first thought was that they were meteors, but i realized that they couldn't be. the objects were close together - maybe 10 feet apart - and were probably each three feet in diameter. they moved slightly while floating there and kind of pulsed. i was just too shocked to move, and afraid to draw attention to myself.  i did not have a camera so couldn't get a picture.  they stayed in that position for approximately 5 minutes, then moved slowly off in an easterly direction - as if they didn't care if anyone saw them or not.  i did not see wings, or a tail or any lights.  the next day i spoke to some neighbors about it and one said they saw something similar earlier that evening but that it was only one ball of light, not three.  he said it was right at tree-top level and then shot off quickly to the east. i just thought that someone should know about this since there have been so many reports lately."
content.summary: Three orange glowing spheres in my backyard

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to my farm in the country on a rural road.  while adjusting my sun visor two shiney silver aircrafts caught my eye straight up in the sky. they were lower than an airplane, about 10k feet up. i saw one, then the other about a mile behind it in a straight line.  i pulled over and got out of the car and tried to take pictures with cell phone, but did not show up on camera.  i saw no wings.  they were cigar shaped with a black band in the middle. the same as pictured in roger marsh's 9/29/11 article.
they eventially disappeared out of sight.  the day was very sunny, no clouds in sight, about 10 a.M.  two days later, i was travelling about a mile away, also on my way to the farm and saw one of the same a/craft.  i grabbed my binoculars and saw the craft turn slightly upward and disappear into the sky.   i know these are not airplanes; there were no wings, no sound or trail and hovered rather than flew.  in the past, i have seen a blimp type craft with a fish tail hovering over the woods line near my farm.  it seemed to be over the county waste area. no sound or movement, then disappeared.  i saw this one about four times, but not since last spring. in all cases, i had no fear of the crafts, just a reluctance to report for fear of government contact.
content.summary: Cigar shaped aircraft shiney silver with black band in middle

content.detailedDescription: Last night (or early this am)   at about 3:50 am i was letting my dog out and looked up in the sky to notice a light that appeared to be far away like a star, but, the light seemed closer and was flickering at a fast rate and very bright.  it would flicker between white and some blue greenish and then have a flash of red in two spots.  to me it seemed either it was in a circle shape and what i was seeing was rotating lights on the bottom of a darker then the sky object.  either it was a circle laying flat and i was seeing the front end and some of the backside...Or the light that wrapped upward to look like wings was actually highlighting a circular object.  i could draw it if needed.  then i lloked to the left and right and noticed  on each side at a good distance from the object a boomerand shaped light that would seem like a pattern of stars, until you notice them moving closer to each other, these lights seemed red and white in nature.   the big object or lights started to descend to the right over the next 40 minutes while the on to the right moved to the left and the one on the left moved down and to the right.  at approximately 4:45 i looked up again and could not see any of them...
content.summary: Last night i saw lights that had to be artificial flickering in a pattern and descending to the right and two smaller objects on both sides that appeared similiar in every way but size.

content.detailedDescription:
At 12:30, just before going to bed, i was peering at the night sky over pleasanton. the moon was near full size and the sky was partially clear of clouds making a spectacular scene.

i noticed a bright light vertically above me. this light was way brighter than all other stars in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane flying over and disregarded it. i also seemed to see 3 lights in a row. but as  i continued to look at this i noticed that this object was not moving, its lights were not flickering. 
i immediately picked up my camera with the 250 mm zoom lens and focussed upward and began to click.

one of my first pics showed 3 blurry lines. the light looked like a line because i shook the camera- dragging the light to appear like a line. it still did not make sense that i had 3 lines in the same pattern.  i have attached the picture below.

then i went out to my patio and began clicking pictures. all the pictures i clicked looked like one bright light except one picture where you could clearly see a 3 light pattern with blue lights on the sides. 

further i also shot a long exposure picture - all the stars in the sky made much thinner trails but this object made a thick trail- indicating a much brighter source.

im not at any point claiming this is a ufo- but id like to know what i saw.

i then proceeded to get my 10x50 mm nikon binoculars and i could see a 5 prong pattern on this object. this object stayed at the same spot for 2 hours. at around 2:30- the clouds began to cover the object and it dimmed out.
content.summary: Bright light spotted over pleasanton

content.detailedDescription: My aunt was staying the night with me at my apartment, she went out to have a smoke a few minutes later asked me to come out and look at something. she pointed at the sky and asked me if her eyes were playing tricks on her or does that star look like it is blinking.  i look at were she was pointing and it looked to me like it was blinking then we noticed that a red light seemed to eminate from it and move from side to side and then a light blue light did the same thing. almost as if it was spinning but it was so far away we couldn't tell it was spinning or not. we could definately see that is was blinking with red and blue lights.  as we kept watching the sky we noticed more of the same type of objects in the sky all with the same caractoristics of the first object. from 10:00pm to 11:07pm we were able to see 7 objects with the exact same caractoristics as the first one.  all 7 objects also seemed to move from side to side and up and down at different time.  also within the same time period we saw what looked like a shooting star which shot toward the nw of where we were looking.  then at about 10:45pm we notice a larger formation (cluster)of dim but white lights off to the right where we were standing and it seemed to have a triangle space and move up and down then side to side but never straying from its original position once it finished moving. this larger object also seemed to have a ridge going down the middle of from the tip of the triangle to the middle of the bottom of it and then a ridge on each side going out to the other 2 points of the triangle.  it was grey in color and very hard to see against the night sky.  it was definately not a plane as we saw 2 planes go by with their red flashing lights. all 8 objects totally looked totally different than the planes.  we also notice a sound of a jet type engine come into hearing range but we could not see it at all.  the sound was like a jet engine with a humming sound at the end.  it was unlike any jet engine i have ever heard and i have lived near airports most of my life.  the only rational explaination i can come up with is that they are unidentified flying objects.  i would like to know if anyone else near my area saw these last night.
content.summary: About 10:00pm my a aunt asked me to look up into the clear night sky to see if i see what she sees and i saw what looked like a star that was blinking with occasional red and blue pulses of light

content.detailedDescription: At approximatley 2140 i was on my way to work ,when i notice a couple  red glowing lights above the tree line to my right. at first they looked like antenna warning lights at differant heights,but they werent blinking. as i continued to drive and watch 4 or 5 bright red lights came to view and they were flying in a loose flying formation,changing positions in the sky moving north east.I came to intersection and pulled over and continue to watch no sound was heard. seconds later all but one disappeared and the one red light continued northeast.
content.summary: Lights  in the sky flying northeast in a loose formation changing positions red in color no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Obsvd 4:40 am - 4:55 am mst @hwy79 & deep well road, pinal co az, three dancing (circles, up, down, sudden starts/stops) lights, w/n as 0deghz, and above as 90degver, 1st 100deghz/30degver dim red, 2nd 248deghz/70degver bright white, 3rd 35deghz/10degver triangular (lights in vertices of triangle).

lights still in sky when left scene.
content.summary: Three separate dancing objects at different parts of the sky, one triangular, the other two pinpoints.

content.detailedDescription: It was a very clear summer day and i was exiting a drug store around lunchtime and a movement and reflective surface caught my attention in the air above me. i looked up to see a metallic looking sphere about 6 to 8 feet in diameter moving in a straight line about 125 to 150 feet above ground. it did not waver or alter it's course and moved very slowly and deliberately. it appeared to be like a large "pinball" as it was all chrome and very mirror-like in it's reflective appearance. i watched it until it went out of sight. it lasted maybe 2 minutes total. the very next day i was again at the same store (lunchtime) and upon exiting i saw the exact same scenario developing again. this time a small family was also coming out of the store and i made them aware of the object to get someone else's corroboration and opinion. the couple had one child with them which upon seeing the "ball" began to cry and asked his father if "they" were going to take them away. again the sphere never wavered or deviated from it's course at all. i did not have a phone with a camera and was probably too much in awe to use one if i did. it is however indelibly etched into my memory. i have tried to see it again at the same time and place but i have not seen it since. i am a pilot and a skilled observer and i assure you this was not a technology that i am aware of. all i can add is it was very awe inspiring.
content.summary: Observed silver sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work when i noticed a shining light moving at incredible speed through the sky changing directions and zipping back and forth as i observed this i let my car slow to a stop and just sat and watched the sky it never crossed my mind of other traffic however there were other vehicles anyhow as i watched this object it slowed to a hover and seemed a ways into the distance but then it began to glow and it glowed brighter and brighter until its light was blinding and impossible to overlook its light seemed to be only yards away and then the glow began to disappate and shrink back to its original position only when the shape took form again it seemed to be oval shaped and n longer sphere shaped i watched until it was almost impossible to see and realized i should get moving since i was at a stop in the middle of the road as i began to take off again i noiced that everyone else had also stopped their vehicles and some were standing in the road next to the vehicle when i began to move i suppose it sparked the same thought into the others and they loaded up and started moving aswell noone said anything to each other during the sighting i could overhear some people saying what the hell and holy **** and oh my god but as it disappeared noone had anything to say to each other we all just went our own ways. these sightings are growing to be the normal thing around here every day or night at any point one can simply go outside and see a ufo everyone here knows about them only noone here talks about them this isnt even the first or most influeincing contact i've had just the most recent.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Glowing object in the sky!

content.detailedDescription: Me and my cousin were driving in saint joe county indiana right outside mishawaka indiana when we saw a very bright light in the distance at first we dismissed it as an motorcycle because of their only being a single light until the light shot some 2-3 miles into the distance of the cornfield after seeing this we accelerated as fast as our 1999 monte carlo would go (around 90-100 mph) to try to lose the "light" it seemed to jump incredible distances in a matter of a second moving from south east to south west behind us maybe a mile or so away after trying to get away from this mysterious light for some time maybe 7 mins or so it disappeared... what really struck me as strange was the static interference on our radio and there was absolutely no sound (no chopper rotary sounds or aircraft afterburner sounds) that would be associated with modern aircraft
content.summary: Made impossible aerial maneuvers with extraordinary speed.

content.detailedDescription: Its becoming a familiar expereince- this being the third time, about annually ( oct 28 2009, oct 29 2010 ) that i have observed cloud/ contrail like objects in teh sky that do not follow natural or manmade rules that i know of. tonight, it was a cloud, with a very long "tail" that traveled steadily west, while the wind and all other clouds in the sky blew east. it passed right over my head, and didn't look to be much higher than the ordinary cumulous clouds below it. i'll attach some of the video i shot that i put up on the internet
content.summary: Reoccuring unnatural cloud / contrail formations/ movements

content.detailedDescription: I moved into the apartments where i currently reside in june.  i started smoking after again after having my son in july.  i smoke outside on my balcony, sometime in august i noticed these strange orange lights in the sky for the first time.  the lights are usually orange and hover in the sky for random periods of time. they move up, down, left and right.  there is usually 4 lights, one is far away and stays in the same general area, the other 3 are closer and will move in unpredictable directions at random speeds in between moments of hovering.  some times the orange lights will seem to pulsate or flash.  when they leave they seem to move very fast out towards outer space, giving the appearance that they are disintegrating or closing in on themselves, if that makes any sense.  tonight, october 9th, i saw just one of the lights.  at first it looked the normal orange color and then started flashing red and white, i can best describe it as the lights on a police can with out the blue.  after a few minutes it left in the normal way and one more briefly came into sight before disappearing.  i have tried on several occasions to take pictures but am always too late or it won���t show up. tonight i was able to get a very poor quality video of the light.  i know that the lights are not air planes because i can see real airplanes flying in the sky at the same time i see the orange lights.  the lights are much bigger than the light an airplane gives off as well.  i normally do not hear any unusual sounds while they are in the sky but a couple of times i���ve thought i had heard a faint hum, but i could just be freaking myself out.  many of my neighbors have scene the lights and no one can explain them.  i just want to know what they are. the video i took doesn't do the light justace and was only able to get my camera in time to catch a few moments of it before it left.  i will keep trying to get a better picture/video of them, and report when i see them next now that i've found this sight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange orange lights in the sky, i’ve seen them about 15 nights over the last 2 months when i step out to smoke.

content.detailedDescription: Went on a canoe trip on kankakee river. took pictures, when looked closer found this orb going up tree
content.summary: Picture of canoe trip

content.detailedDescription:
From campground with little light pollution, orb was darting around in a northerly direction.  appeared to get closer and move away in unusual manner.  witnessed by 3 people.  same orb appeared within 10 minutes but seemed farther away.  cell phone picture taken second time but only shows small light.  seems like it was cylindrical with light or flames shooting in downward manner.
all three of us had never seen anything look or move like this object was moving.  we had a very clear view as we were at a campground with very little light, trees or buildings around us.  took a picture on the second visit but it only looks tiny, however looks like another smaller object is behind it that we didn't see with our own eyes.  
we are all normal professional people and have never seen or reported anything like this before.
content.summary: Witnessed by 3 of us twice within 10 minutes

content.detailedDescription: It was bright, magnetic and pulling. i was in the woods of souther indiana, and the lights stunned me into submission to it's magnetic pull. i couldn't move. i was frozen in time and place, suspended as though i were a piece of pear in a lime jello mixture. it has never left my mind, and i have frequent, recurrent flashbacks of the sighting.
content.summary: It was bright and compelling. i felt powerless in the grip of it's shadow and light.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: After work on a friday evening, i was sitting in my car in my home driveway talking to my friend on my cell phone (connected to my car speakers). i was sitting in my car for a good 20+ minutes, when i noticed a large, dark figure from my peripheral vision and quickly looked over. at first, i assumed it could have maybe been a blimp because of the color, density, and low altitude of this craft. i was stunned and opened my car window with my mouth hanging open in awe while i witnessed this bronze/dark copper colored oval craft with large square windows (with bright colorful lights flashing sequentially from the windows) slowly move from south to north. i was still on my phone with my friend at this moment while i was witnessing this, and described this to my friend. i immediately ended the phone call while i tried to take a picture with my blackberry of what i saw. this craft was so low in the sky that i saw how detailed the windows, lights, color, shape, and material of this ship was. i could not unfortunately take the photo with my phone as i could not find the point in the sky with the small camera lens of my phone and did not want to take my eyes off this craft. i continued to watch in amazement while this craft floated almost right over me and watched it slowly ascend away towards the north. with this, an airplane was flying by from north to south (opposite direction) right past this craft, so close to each other-- i thought they were going to collide. i could not believe my eyes. in broad daylight, this silver plane was maybe 50-100 feet away from this dark bronze oval craft with brilliant flashing lights floating in the opposite direction. i continued to watch this craft ascend higher and higher into the sky, farther and farther away. with no visible clouds in the sky, i was able to maintain a good visual on where this craft was going. i watched until this craft seemed to disappear from thin air. i assumed it may have flew into a cloud or fog, but there was none in the sky. i was amazed and am certain i will never remember what i saw. it was a ufo.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Bronze/dark copper flying craft with large windows with bright flashing lights seen flying over staten island, ny

content.detailedDescription: I was at work, driving a haul truck in an open pit mine and 4 flashing, star like lights caught my eye to the nw in the sky. it was around 9pm and they were not in any type of formation and seemed to float along rather slowly at first then went fast. as they flashed, there was no specific time between the intervals as they flashed randomly. they made circles around the mine and dissipated over the mountains to the west rather quick. when i was watching them for a good 30 mins or so it gave me chills and i wish others would have seen what i saw.
content.summary: I saw 4 starlike blinking objects hovering over the mine. they had no set pattern and circled over the mine in no certain formation.

content.detailedDescription: There were two of us walking at around 7pm on christmas day 2009. we were in a town in the west of scotland near glasgow, and it was a quiet and very cold, crisp evening. we were walking towards a row of residential buildings (the front of the buildings facing us) when above the roof tops we seen a round glowing object travelling towards us (but overhead) very quickly. we noticed it because it was bright and moving quickly in our direction. we both stopped and asked eachother what we thought it was, it was like nothing we had seen. much too big to be a star, definitiely not a comet, too fast to be a chinese lantern. feeling a little panicked we just stood and stared and i reached into my bag for my camera. i took some photographs but had to zoom. as it became closer overhead it slowed down and descended before acsending very rapidly and vanishing into the clouds. we were both quite scared by it and shaking a little, even though we did not see it close up we both thought because of the direction and speed it was going it may land on top of us! we're not joking when we say that, it was quite frightening. as soon as it dissappeared we rushed on home (only a few feet away) and felt glad to be inside. we called everyone we knew and told them to check the skies, but they laughed it off. we also kept our eye on the news over the next couple of days but there was nothing. we uploaded the photographs that were taken to our computer and they turned out pretty blurry, mainly because the zoom on the camera was not so good and possibly because of the speed of the object. it was not a windy evening, quite still and the object made no noise, and had no wings or anything like that.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Descent very quickly towards us (2) before rapidly ascending into sky at great speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down traynor ave in kitchener when i spotted it in the sky directly in front of me. i pulled into the church parking lot to park and get out for a better view. there were 3 people there looking in the sky as well at the object. at first i thought it may have been a plane on fire or something because it looked kinda like fire but it was randomly pulsating and flashing and at times disappeared for a split second and reappeared in a different spot a little higher. there were no clouds in the sky, or airplanes that i could see. it was a beautiful evening 20 c. there was no noise...
the object disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strange glowing fiery red light multiple witnesses. observed for approximately 10 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
recently there have been numerous sightings in the area where i am living.  i live on a cliff overlooking the sea of cortez and a beautiful little cove beach.  there were two sightings in september - - one on september 2 and then again on september 18.  these sightings were viewed by people in the housing community next to where i live  i will tell you about those later.  

last night my husband and i both saw what we  feel were ufo's.  we were walking along the walkway returning from dinner at a friend's house to our condo.  my husband suddenly said he left his cell phone in the car and returned to the car to get his phone.  at this point, i was walking alone and looked in the sky and saw an amber colored light traveling along the sea of cortez (east to west).  it was very bright and looked like a burning light (orange/red). it traveled up and to the west and then just seemed to disappear.  (i don't know if it disappeared behind a cloud or just vanished.)  
there aren't many clouds here. i entered my condo and minutes later my husband came in.  i said to him "did you see the ufo?"  he said "no" and then proceeded to make fun of me saying "yeah, right - - you saw a ufo. you seem pretty calm for having just seen a ufo."  i said "well, i've been expecting to see one."  he then went out on the deck and screamed "oh my god - - get the camera!!!"   there was another bright light - - traveling the same way .  it seemed like every minute another one would go by until four went by our deck.  my husband is a pilot and he said the lights looked nothing like anything he has ever seen.(that's five in all - - counting the one i saw while walking to our condo.  they traveled faster than an airplane.  my husband stayed out on the deck and fifteen minutes later - - another one came by - - only this one seemed to go straight out over the sea of cortez (south)and in a different direction from all the others.  



as for the other sightings - - there is a man who teaches tai chi on our little beach here.  he is a very honest, spiritual man.  he was up one morning at about 4:00 a.M. or 4:30 a.M on or about september 2 - - when he saw a strange looking, amber colored light in the sky.  it hovered over the housing community where he was staying.  he said he could hear a buzzing sound from it.  he drew a picture in the sand of what he saw.  it was a ufo with amber colored lights around the bottom.  he said that the lights changed color - - multi colored - - and then went over the hill to the beach.  when it went down to the beach he said it morphed in size and color.  originally it was about the size of a volkswagon and then changed to the size of a trailer and the color was bluish white.  he said he saw it leaving just before sunrise and then "poof" - - it just disappeared.  he said he felt a lot of love coming from the craft.

then on or about september 18 at about 4:30 a.M. - - two night time security guards at the housing community next to us saw a craft hovering over their community.  they described it as a ufo with amber colored lights.  they watched as it went down towards the beach and changed color and they say that it disappeared into the sea.  they tried to take a photograph but the photo only showed something that looked like intereference on a television screen.  they were freigtened by the experience.
content.summary: My husband and i witnessed amber colored lights traveling across the sky over the sea of cortez in cabo san lucas, mexico
content.locationName: Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur

content.detailedDescription: Driving and saw string of orange orbs...Like two groups...Some close like they would crash ...Hovering...Then darting off and disappearing.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange lights in sky ...Two groups apx 5-7 each apx 100 feet aprt...Flying se ..Darting...Hovering..Gone

content.detailedDescription: I was setting on my deck in lees summit about 8-9pm on the 4th/oct when i saw a huge v-shaped craft flying south directly over me. i mean right above me which seemed like 500 feet or so. its kinda hard to tell at night but this ufo was bigger than a nfl football field easily.  it was going at an incredible slow pace and very low. it was so low i could hear a very slight hum coming from it as its usually very quite outside at that time. i know many say they are quite but i could hear something. i could see many blue & white lights blinking at times but at times they were solid. i could also see what seemed to be 6 dark circles underneath (3 on each side) of the v-shape what i believed to be the engines or turbines. again very quite with a very slight hum. as it flew south it stopped and just hovered for a couple of minutes the turned to the left and went east for i say 5 miles then it turned again very abruptly in a very sharp l shaped turn. i knew no plan or helicopter can do that so it was a ufo---for sure!. then it slowly moved north at about 40-50 miles an hour until it it seemed like it was about 15 miles away then all of a sudden dropped down out of site. i will watch the skies every night around that time as i am not the only one who saw this. on a side note: this is the second time i have seen a ufo. the other time was in the late 60's early 70's in mission kansas. are ufo's real? you bet they are! there are billions of stars and planets out there. do you really think we are the only one with life on it? anyone who thinks other wise are blind.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo over lees summit....Amazing sight!

content.detailedDescription: Well my story started with me standing in the yard and i can't remember if i was dreaming or i was really awake....But when i looked up i saw clouds at first and i thought to myself i better get inside before it starts raining...So as im thinking about it i notice this dark shadow come from behind the cloud and i try to focus cause its pretty dark outside...Thats when i noticed it was a ufo....I have never seen anything like that...It was round but it almost looked like a floating city but with no lights on...And while im in awe of the one i saw i didnt notice that there was smaller ones following behind it...I was frozen with fear cause i didnt know if i was getting taken or what was going to happen...But the next thing i know im in bed and i had to figure out if i was dreaming or was i really seeing something and i have been dealing with question for the last four years...
content.summary: Saw what looked like to me an invasion...Not sure what i saw
